title: varuvAi enrE
sahitya:
varuvAi enrE vizhi nIr perukki vazhi tanai nOkki vADiyuLLEnE 
marugA anbargaL manamenum kOyilil uyar kAdaluDanE oLir tani shuDarE


anupallavi

  oru nALallavE palanAL pArttuLLEn uLLak-kadavinai aDaippadaiy-marandEn 
virudAvAga en vANAL kazhivadO virudena vAraNam shENuyar arashE


caraNam    Ezhai en kuDilinil ezhundaruL vIrena edir pArppadum unak-kizhaivai-yuNDArkkumO 
ennuLam koNDa Ashaiyin perukkAl eNNAdanavelAm eNNiuginrEnayyA 
shUzhum aindaru malindOngum indiran kOyil tuNaiviyuDan irundOi shiru malaik-kADadanil 
tUya manakkuravar shei pazham kuDil tannuL tOnriyamarnda nAthA sharavaNap-pU magizhvOi
